<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Malgorzata Niska](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2289)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 197</row>

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), shabble, wand of [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (1st), [wooden religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), 23 sp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 85

**Spiteful Command**  <actions string="Reaction" /> ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) **Trigger** Malgorzata is targeted with an attack or single-target spell. **Effect** Malgorzata commands a Gyronna cultist within reach of the triggering creature to attack the creature, allowing it to make a melee Strike after the triggering action resolves its effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **3rd**
[Crisis of Faith](/Spells.aspx?ID=55), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Cleric Domain Spells 1 Focus Points** DC 22
- **3rd**
[Waking Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=468)

**Divine Rituals** 

- **2nd**
[Consecrate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=8)

</column>
name: Malgorzata Niska
